mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pompe funèbre en l'honneur des citoyens soldats morts à Nancy
Funeral in honor of the citizen soldiers killed at Nancy
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Several lines of soldiers stand at attention and watch men carry flags around the base of a hill. The hill has steps leading up to a large, ornate box or building. Four fires burn on each corner of the hill, producing smoke that floats to the cloudy sky
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
